DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being._A change from the patient's baseline sleeping pattern, either an increase or a decrease in the number of hours slept. This can also refer to alterations in the stages of sleep._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being._A change from the patient's baseline sleeping pattern, either an increase or a decrease in the number of hours slept. This can also refer to alterations in the stages of sleep.

Property.preferredDefinition: A change from the patient's baseline sleeping pattern, either an increase or a decrease in the number of hours slept. This can also refer to alterations in the stages of sleep.

Concepts.definition: A change from the patient's baseline sleeping pattern, in the hours slept and/or an alteration/dysfunction in the stages of sleep.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ReferenceDocuments.name: A questionnaire to assess sle
ReferenceDocuments.description: A questionnaire to assess sleep disorders, which are a broad group of disorders that can be caused by endogenous disturbances in the sleep-wake or timing cycles exacerbated by conditioning (primary sleep disorders), other mental disorders, medications or substances, or other general medical conditions

DataElement.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21
